author: Master_Wu
title: I love it!
review:
This Cowboy suit guy is plain but fun!

His legs are plain brown with little hoof printings at the tows to act like the horse's legs. the horses tail rests on the legs as the torso keeps it in place. Main part of the horse looks really nice! There isn't much detail but it looks perfect! The torso has some rather odd colors which I'm not a big fan of but the horse mostly covers that up! 

I would recommend this set for almost any lego fan mainly for the horse!

author: Odeinoichus
title: Yeehaw! Git'along Little Horsie!
review:
Set #71021 Cowboy Costume Guy: Dressed in a classic top with tassels Hollywood made famous as 'authentic' cowboy duds, this here party guest is sporting two new pieces, the front end of a horse on a neck bracket which fits over the neck and a horses tail which slides over the waist connection posts for the legs. I believe that second piece is a re-use from Unicorn Girl though, this time it's in brown, so it's still a new colour.

He carries no accessories, a rather odd trait amongst most of these party guests, but I suppose it is to be expected with so many new elements included. Sporting a large brimmed tan cowboy hat and plain brown legs with no printing, this Minfigure is an excellent addition from Series 18. I'd recommend him as a must own figure, the parts are great fun, and I really hope LEGO re-uses them at some point in traditional black or white LEGO horse colours. Recommended.
